issue.title: [Gandiva] Remove spurious gtest include
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3718](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3718). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
At the moment, cpp/src/gandiva/expr_decomposer.h includes a gtest header which can prevent gandiva to be built without the gtest dependency.
